def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split('')
    words.reverse()
    reversed_string = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split(' ')
    words.reverse()
    reversed_string = ''.join(words)
    return reversed_string
